text:
China's CoronaVac has been classified as 'safe' for children aged 3-7 Years of age, according to a study published in a recent edition of the journal 'Lancet Infectious Diseases.'
#CORONAVAC #Chinese #vaccine #COVID19 #VACCINES #CHILDREN #COVID19 #CoronaVaccine #briflynews https://t.co/Y2weBWe2N6
